channel.title: Projects on Fossinating
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Fossinating

item.title: Course Manager
item.description: Web app designed to assist UNC students in planning their schedules

item.title: Disruptive Dungeons
item.description: In a dystopian robot-run future, play as a captured robot, working to escape the dungeon of a gang of scrapper robots

item.title: Free Shipping
item.description: Play as a robot working to free itself from the grasp of corporate control

item.title: Slimey Dungeons
item.description: In the classic fantasy world of monsters and dungeons, play as a slime monster breaking the mold and becoming a dungeon raider

item.title: Chaindle
item.description: Variant of Wordle in which players are able to play through an infinite chain of target words
